Russia strikes civilian targets in Kharkiv, at least 8 woundedA Russian attack on central Kharkiv on Saturday injured eight people, striking a medical institution, apartment buildings and other civilian sites, the regional governor said. Sat, 30 Dec 2023 18:28:10 GMT CH3MRVEIO5MMLDKV3FZ5I7AUGA https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/ Russia-strikes-civilian-targets-kharkiv-least-8-wounded-officials-2023-12-30/Reuters世界欧洲
Israeli ex-hostage says she feared being raped by Gaza captorAn Israeli-French woman who was among scores of people taken hostage by Hamas militants has described how she feared being raped by the gunman who watched over her around the clock in the home where he lived with his wife and children in Gaza. Sat, 30 Dec 2023 18:21:16 GMT 5B7YSY2BFJMZ5BQRK7N4CTJBOY https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/israeli-ex-hostage-says-she-feared-being-raped-by-gaza-captor-2023-12-30/Reuters世界中东
Nicaragua arrests four more priests, intensifies crackdown on Catholic ChurchNicaraguan police detained four more priests early on Saturday, bringing the total number to 12 over the past three days, according to a high-ranking member of the Catholic Church with knowledge of the matter and local media. Sat, 30 Dec 2023 18:13:46 GMT AEVI6BZLTJJLBAM26KZTT3L4QU https://www.reuters.com/world/americas/nicaragua-arrests-four-more-priests-intensizes-crackdown-catholic-church-2023-12-30/Ismael Lopez世界美洲
Magnitude 6.3 earthquake strikes Papua, IndonesiaA magnitude 6.3 earthquake struck Papua, Indonesia on Sunday, the European-Mediterranean Seismological Centre said. Sat, 30 Dec 2023 17:37:38 GMT VT2MICQWMZKKFN3QYVT2JP53XA https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/magnitude-62-earthquake-strikes-papua-indonesia-emsc-2023-12-30/Reuters世界亚太地区
Burundi's president says gay people should be stonedBurundi's President Evariste Ndayishimiye has called on citizens to stone gay people, escalating a crackdown on sexual minorities in a country where LGBT people already face social ostracism and jail terms of up to two years if convicted of same-sex offences. Sat, 30 Dec 2023 17:35:27 GMT 6MCN44P4CROXFFXEEGDPCYYTHM https://www.reuters.com/world/africa/burundis-president-says-gay-people-should-be-stoned-2023-12-30/Reuters世界非洲
Palestinian group says captive Israeli soldier killed in Gaza by Israeli air strikeThe armed wing of the Popular Front for the Liberation of Palestine said on Saturday that an Israeli soldier being held captive by the group in Gaza had been killed in an Israeli air strike that had also wounded some of his captors. Sat, 30 Dec 2023 17:25:41 GMT 73JGPZLXPJNCRHLFEQJZ5EA5S4 https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/palestinian-group-says-captive-israeli-soldier-killed-gaza-by-israeli-air-strike-2023-12-30/Reuters世界中东
Nigerian lawmakers pass 2024 budget after Tinubu seeks extra fundsNigerian lawmakers approved a 28.77 trillion naira ($34 billion) budget for 2024 on Saturday, accepting a funding increase which the government had sought due to higher revenue forecasts and a weaker currency. Sat, 30 Dec 2023 16:34:23 GMT HQDX3VZG5RIIPKDYEVVCC3BZHM https://www.reuters.com/world/africa/nigerian-lawmakers-pass-2024-budget-after-tinubu-seeks-extra-funds-2023-12-30/Camillus Eboh世界非洲
ASEAN foreign ministers express concern over South China Sea tensionsForeign ministers of Southeast Asia's regional bloc ASEAN on Saturday expressed their concern over growing tensions in the South China Sea which they said could threaten regional peace and urged for peaceful dialogue among parties. Sat, 30 Dec 2023 16:34:15 GMT 4E7VU5YIM5KMJDB5GLJWA2FTDE https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/asean-foreign-ministers-express-concern-over-south-china-sea-tensions-2023-12-30/Reuters世界亚太地区
Georgian billionaire ex-PM Ivanishvili returns to politics before electionFormer Georgian prime minister Bidzina Ivanishvili, a billionaire widely held to wield huge political influence, said on Saturday he was returning to frontline politics after two years, ahead of parliamentary elections in 2024. Sat, 30 Dec 2023 15:01:32 GMT HUFVF3XLN5MY7MPM267IFI3IKU https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/georgian-billionaire-ex-pm-ivanishvili-returns-politics-before-election-2023-12-30/Felix Light世界欧洲
Serbian opposition demands annulment of Dec. 17 voteThousands gathered in a square in in central Belgrade on Saturday in the biggest protest yet over parliamentary and municipal elections on Dec. 17, results of which the demonstrators want anulled. Sat, 30 Dec 2023 14:50:40 GMT POM63OW2XJPJBP7MFFE7ASBU2M https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/serbian-opposition-demands-annulment-dec-17-vote-2023-12-30/Ivana Sekularac世界欧洲
Over 1,000 Burundian soldiers covertly deploy in eastern Congo, internal UN report saysOver 1,000 Burundian troops have been covertly deployed in eastern Democratic Republic of Congo since October, wearing the uniform of Congolese troops and working alongside them in the fight against M23 rebels, an unpublished U.N. report seen by Reuters showed. Sat, 30 Dec 2023 14:43:04 GMT SPJOMXDJ25KW5M2DD5CB6TA3YQ https://www.reuters.com/world/africa/over-1000-burundian-soldiers-covertly-deploy-eastern-congo-internal-un-report-2023-12-30/Sonia Rolley世界非洲
